long_description: For full-on alpine conditions, the DAS parka for men is the warmest insulated jacket Patagonia offers. It keeps you warm and dry with high-loft PrimaLoft(R) and a water-resistant, windproof shell. Insulated throughout with 120g of PrimaLoft Synergy insulation, with an added layer of heat-trapping 60g of PrimaLoft One in the chest, abdomen and back for core warmth. Lightweight polyurethane-coated ripstop nylon shell is highly water resistant and windproof; treated with a Durable Water Repellenet finish that beads up water so it rolls off. Helmet-compatible hood has visor and single-pull drawcord to adjust overall volume and peripheral vision. Full-length, 2-way zipper features an internal, insulated windflap and fold-over zipper garage for comfort. Zippered, insulated handwarmer pockets; two large interior mesh drop-in pockets; one exterior zippered chest pocket. Elasticized cuffs and discreet drawcord at droptail hem. Patagonia DAS parka for men comes with a stuff sack.
short_description: For full-on alpine conditions, the DAS parka for men is the warmest insulated jacket Patagonia offers. It keeps you warm and dry with high-loft PrimaLoft(R) and a water-resistant, windproof shell.
